fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Manipulated Evidence- (Night) Target a Cog and choose a role. They will appear as that role to investigations tonight.
Objection!- (Day) [Cheat] Use during the day and choose a target. If you are lynched today and your target voted for you, they will die as well, taking a Modkill-tier Attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -Objection! Must be used before you are hammered/the day ends, otherwise it will have no effect.
